description: Duplicates were found for Pottery in 1962 and 1963. The more conservative PCI estimate has been used.

fields.name: Product complexity index (PCI) SITC classification - OEC (2016)
fields.description: The PCI measures the knowledge intensity of a product by considering the knowledge intensity of its exporters.
